title: The Return of Slade Garner
description: The heat between Slade and Celina went way back, but even as high school sweethearts, Celina's passion for learning had vied with Slade's passion for hockey. Now the entire town was cheering hockey star Slade Garner's return, while Celina feared the sensual fire that had once raged between them. What if it was still dangerously smoldering?Smoldering, hell! Slade was burning out of control. But now that Celina was a top-flight educator, how could he admit that he knew so little, that his career off the ice was uncertain...and that he needed her to show him a future that could rival the glory of their past...?
author: Dee Holmes
